entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
